text: Haven Jesse Barlow (January 4, 1922 - February 6, 2022) was an American politician. He was a Republican member of the Utah House of Representatives and Utah State Senate. He was president of the Utah Senate from 1967 to 1972. Barlow was born in Clearfield, Utah. An alumnus of Utah State University and the Harvard Business School, and veteran of World War II where he served in the US Navy, he was also the president and founder of Barlow Realty and Insurance. He was also a director of the Utah Symphony. Barlow turned 100 in January 2022. He died one month later in Layton, Utah on February 6, 2022.Former Utah lawmaker Haven Barlow dies at 100 ==References== Category:1922 births Category:2022 deaths Category:American centenarians Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Politicians from Utah Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Haven J. Barlow
